title: [Jtag-Rgh] [NEW Upload] MGS GZ in game install file-WhenAManCrie
description:
Hi Gamers & Fan boys of MGS Series



This is a new re-upload of the in game install file for the MGS Ground Zeroes Xbox360 Ver.


this only works for JTAG/RGH systems & specially for those who have 4 Gb consoles and 

External hard drives and have problem with the game.

this file is not full game.plus this file you also need XEX rip,I repeat Xex rip only 

cause the game have a problem with GOD rip .


1.Copy the in game install file to this directory in your internal hard drive:

Hdd1  Content  0000000000000000  4B4E085C  00000001  gamedata_na(the file here)

2.Run the Default.Xex file from Xex rip on your External hard drive then the game 

must work.(you must copy the Xex rip to your external drive)

------------------------
this game is Amazing !!
Best game's Graphic on Xbox360 so far, Very good gameplay & enemy AI !!!

If you like the game and have money support the kojima Production and buy the game.

PEACE! :)
